title: Apollo All to MP4 Converter Cracked EXE Proximity
description:
Apollo iPod Video converter converts video files for optimized video playback on Apple iPod.Integrated MPEG-4 encoder which has super fast conversion speed with high quality plus advanced video editing features give you everything you need to turn iPod into a portable media center. Apollo iPod Video converter supports most popular format on internet such as DivX, XviD, AVI, WMV, MPG, MPEG, ASF, RM, RMVB, MOV, ASX, SVCD, VCD stream formats.With Apollo iPod Video converter, watch TVs, movies, home videos on the go - a new lifestyle to experience.

Key Features:
 
Preview source clips. 
Video source supports AVI, Divx, Xvid, MPEG, WMV, ASF, RM, RMVB, SVCD, VCD, MOV any video format play-able. 
Setting Profiles realize 1-click to be professional. 
Batch files conversion. 
Custom define the output audio volume. 
2-Pass encoding ensures the best output video quality. 
Direct any video files to MPEG-4 format play-able on iPod without losing quality. 
High-speed encoder ensures smooth conversion of video and audio data. 
Movie scene spot edit-able. 
Keep the original aspect ratio or resize movie to fit the iPod monitor resolution. 

Also Converts to Zune
